oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Celebrating the 100 Birthday of Bill Monroe - 2011-09-28
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Celebration of the 100 birthday of bluegrass founder Bill Monroe with The Del McCoury Band; Dale Anne Bradley; Claire Lynch; Nashville Bluegrass Band; Peter Rowan; Ricky Skaggs; Roland White from Ingram Hall at the Blair School of Music on September 28, 2011. Presented by the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum and the Vanderbilt University Blair School of Music.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: The Del McCoury Band; Dale Anne Bradley; Claire Lynch; The Nashville Bluegrass Band; Peter Rowan; Ricky Skaggs; Roland White;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Program hosted by Bill Cody; Performances include; Watermelon Hanging On The Vine (Del McCoury Band); Uncle Pen (Ricky Skaggs with the Del McCoury Band); What Would You Give In Exchange For Your Soul (Ricky Skaggs and Del McCoury); Muleskinner Blues (Peter Rowan with the Del McCoury Band); It's Might Dark To Travel (Ricky Skaggs with the Del McCoury Band); Will You Be Loving Another Man (Roland White with the Del McCoury Band); Bluegrass Breakdown (the Del McCoury Band); I'm On My Way To The Old Home (Claire Lynch with the Del McCoury Band); Close By (Matt Combs and Stuart Duncan with the Del McCoury Band); Wheel Hoss (Matt Combs with the Nashville Bluegrass Band); In Despair (Dale Anne Bradley with the Nashville Bluegrass Band); Dark As The Night , Blue Is The Day (the Nashville Bluegrass Band); The Walls Of Time (Peter Rowan with the Nashville Bluegrass Band); Midnight On The Stormy Deep (Claire Lynch; Dale Anne Bradley with Roland White and the Nashville Bluegrass Band); Jerusalem Ridge (the Nashville Bluegrass Band); My Last Days On Earth (the Nashville Bluegrass Band); I'm Working On A Building (Roland White; Dale Anne Bradley; Claire Lynch; Peter Rowan; Pat Enright); Rawhide (the Nashville Bluegrass Band);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Bluegrass music--2011-2020; Del McCoury Band; Bradley, Dale Anne; Lynch, Claire; Nashville Bluegrass Band; Rowan, Peter; Skaggs, Ricky; White, Roland; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.); Vanderbilt University. Blair School of Music;
